name: Lawn Buster for Hire
description:
Play as Lawn Buster, and trim the grass in randomly-generated lawns while following an increasingly complex series of rules and priorities.

This game takes about 10 minutes to complete, and there are 5 different endings based on your decisions.

Development, design, and music by Chris "Turd Boomerang" Armstrong.

Art by Kenney

This game was developed for Necrosoft Games' charity bundle to benefit the citizens of Ukraine.
